alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:58AM MST until January 16 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST early this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 AM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions especially from the the town of Vail up to Vail Pass. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
